fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.hem2020e3.equipments.boiler

Class BoilerReactiveController

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.hem2020e3.equipments.boiler.BoilerReactiveController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI

    public class BoilerReactiveController
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
    The class BoilerWaterTemperatureReactiveController implements a simple reactive controller with hysteresis for a boiler.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant       Boiler.EXTERNAL_TEMP < targetTemp
 invariant       targetTemp < Boiler.STANDARD_HEATING_TEMP

    Created on : 2021-01-04

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
